client.client module¶

class client.client.Client(account_name, password, status='disconnected', sq_gui=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

class for process communication between client and server

action_handler(msg)[source]¶

process messages from server and client GUI :param msg: Any type of @dataclass from .messages

add_contact(name)[source]¶

send AddContact request to server :param name: target username for adding to contact list :return: messages.AddContact

authenticate()[source]¶

send Authenticate request to server :return: messages.Authenticate

authenticated(msg: messages.Authenticate)[source]¶

process Authenticate message from server send GetContacts message if Authenticate.result is True :param msg: Authenticate message from server :type msg: messages.Authenticate

close()[source]¶

close connection with server

del_contact(name)[source]¶

send DelContact request to server :param name: target username for deleting from contact list :return: messages.DelContact

feed_data(data)[source]¶

send data to server Encrypt data if client has session_key and cipher :param data: Any type of @dataclass from .messages or close

get_contacts()[source]¶

send GetContacts request to server :return: messages.GetContacts

get_data()[source]¶

get data from user GUI

get_messages(tm, contact='')[source]¶

send GetMessages request to server :param tm: request messages created after this time :type tm: float :param contact: list of contacts returning by server :return: messages.GetMessages

join(room)[source]¶

send Join request to server :param room: room name to join :return: messages.Join

leave(room)[source]¶

send Leave request to server :param room: room name to leave :return: messages.Leave

on_msg(msg)[source]¶
presence()[source]¶

send Presence answer to server :return: messages.Presence

response_processor(msg: messages.Response)[source]¶
send_key()[source]¶

send client public key to server

send_message(to, text)[source]¶

send message to server to target user :param to: target username :param text: message body :return: messages.Msg

sender(msg)[source]¶

send message to server :param msg: Any type of @dataclass from .messages
